title: RC VI Early childhood association (national, regional, state or local)

associations.name: National Association for the Education of Young Children (NAEYC)
associations.role: Advocate for quality early childhood education
associations.details: Focuses on professional development, accreditation, and resources for educators.

associations.name: Southern Early Childhood Association (SECA)
associations.role: Regional support for early childhood educators
associations.details: Provides conferences, publications, and professional networks across southern states.

associations.name: Texas Association for the Education of Young Children (TXAEYC)
associations.details: Coordinates professional development events and advocates for early childhood policy in Texas.

associations.name: Austin Early Childhood Alliance
associations.details: Supports local educators, families, and programs through resources and networking.
